document.full_text: hedge fund founder raj rajaratnam was found guilty on all 14 counts of insider trading in a sweeping victory for the government and a vindication of its aggressive use of phone taps to pursue wall street crimes.
document.title: rajaratnam convicted on all insider trading charges
lines_and_colors: hedge fund founder raj rajaratnam was found guilty on all 14 counts of insider trading in a sweeping victory for the government and a vindication of its aggressive use of phone taps to pursue wall street crimes.
